text: ‘Arau mora sanmukhata ta'oraatara yi (siksa) ache tara satyayanakarairaupe arau tomalokara babe yi haraama achila tarae kichumana halala karaara babe arau ma'i tomalokara pratipalakara paraa tomalokara babe nidarsana lai ahicho. Eteke tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau mora anugatya karaa’
